name: 360 Seconds To Live
description:
360 Seconds To Live

Warning : There is a lot of bugs and it's not balanced at all

Another little fun game

In 360 Seconds To Live, you have to manage 3 ressources, your Money, your Hunger and your Thirst.

You have 10 seconds to choose what to do in order to maintain the pressure.

There is a shop where you can buy upgrades to generate more ressources when you click one of the three actions.

All your comments are highly appreciated and will help me :)
